item.title: Gen 12 A. Midterm (2022)
item.description: Question 1 Write a program in Java Enter from the keyboard a number n (n > 1) Enter from the keyboard n pairs of x and y coordinates, data type float Calculate the angle between the x and y coordinates of each pair $$(\overrightarrow{a}, \overrightarrow{b}) = \arccos \left( \frac{\overrightarrow{a} \times \overrightarrow{b}}{| \overrightarrow{a} | \times | \overrightarrow{b}|} \right)$$ Question 2 Using inheritance to write a Java program to read/write data from/to a text file
